definition: to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: The water in bathroom need to be boiled for drinking.
sentences.chinese: 卫生间内的水要烧开后才能饮用。

sentences.english: Toilet and bidet, also with a place to change baby's diapers.
sentences.chinese: 卫生间和洗脚池，还有婴儿的尿布台。

sentences.english: Write "I love you" on the bathroom mirror with a piece of soap.
sentences.chinese: 用一块肥皂在卫生间里的镜子上写“我爱你”。

sentences.english: Laying of tiles to wall and floor surfaces in the staff toilets;
sentences.chinese: 对员工卫生间的墙体及地面贴砖。

sentences.english: Well, there is a public rest room on main street.
sentences.chinese: 哦，在主街那有个公共卫生间。

sentences.english: Carry me into the washroom directly.
Mulan went to the bathroom and took a little longer than usual to come out.
sentences.chinese: 穆兰上了卫生间，花了比平时更久一点的时间才出来。

sentences.english: The service core is diagonally opposite as are the document lounges and the toilets.
sentences.chinese: 服务核心与文档室和卫生间位于斜对面的位置。

sentences.english: In the restroom sof that cybercafe, dad connected to mom.
sentences.chinese: 在网吧卫生间两人打到一坨。

sentences.english: Blue bath rooms are appropriately watery.
sentences.chinese: 蓝色的卫生间与水相衬恰如其分。

sentences.english: Women have better rest rooms. They get the nice chairs andred carpet。
sentences.chinese: 女人的卫生间很讲究，那里有精致的椅子和红地毯。

sentences.english: Inmate work crews clean these bathrooms every day.
sentences.chinese: 囚犯们每天都要打扫这些卫生间。

sentences.english: That he is a buffoon with bathroom fixtures of gold?
sentences.chinese: 他是个小丑，家里的卫生间都镀着金？

sentences.english: Small toilet installs w. c. pan couchant type to be used in order to save more.
sentences.chinese: 小卫生间多设置蹲式大便器以节省使用。

sentences.english: He Yun rapidly from tube wall climbed into the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 何芸迅速从墙外翻爬进了卫生间里。

sentences.english: Such, even if is in toilet, also have enjoy never-failing knowledge and pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 这样，即便在卫生间里，也有享受不尽的知识与快乐。

definition: drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
variant of 陽臺|阳台[yang2 tai2]
chamber pot/wooden pan used as toilet/toilet bowl
